Bartosz "UNFAKE" Bernacki has announced that Team Vitality has allowed him to explore options as a restricted free agent.

"Still under contract with Team Vitality but I've been allowed to explore my options for the upcoming season while they decide on the team's shape going forward," UNFAKE said in his announcement.

Vitality's newest IGL is in search of new opportunities.
